title: Michael Præst
text:
Michael Præst (born 25 July 1986 in <a href="Give%20%28Denmark%29">Give</a>) is a <a href="Denmark">Danish</a> professional <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player in the <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> position, who currently plays for <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lag%20Reykjav%C3%ADkur">KR Reykjavíkur</a> in the <a href="%C3%9Arvalsdeild">Úrvalsdeild</a>.
Career.
On 1 September 2007 he signed a 2-year contract with <a href="Vejle%20Boldklub">Vejle Boldklub</a>, after playing in the club as a youth player. He made his debut for Vejle in August 2008, and went on to play five games and score one goal for the club, including two league games. He was <a href="loan%20%28football%29">loaned out</a> to Kolding FC in January 2009, and signed a permanent contract with the club in July 2009. He prolonged his Kolding deal in January 2010.
